post.body: I am too!!! In case you're curious!
Where were you when I needed you??? Running 20 alone is NO fun!
I had to run by the Dutch Goose too.. UGH! I ran an 8:46 pace for the whole 20M. It was GREAT!!! How the lungs?
At a stop light!! I had to put the phone away after that..needed to move faster!!
good luck with that.
more then u know! LOL
Ha. I sure did eat the crabby patty!
Feel ill...we will see how impressive it is. If you are in Portola Valley and see me...don't hesitate to run me over!
Bummer! Sunflower seeds and gatorade..of course there is always taco bell..
Hey! I am heading out on a 20 pretty soon. I hope the rain stays away!! I will update when I return!
Got ya...Any day!
cowboys 17 Ravens 19 GAME ON!!!
Az 24 BYU 14
Cowboys might want to turn it on now!
Cute!! I like Randy's...haha
you have 5 kids?
YES!!! I love them!!! So cute...
yes I did... not a big neck! Haha! Yes that was sooo much fun! we must do it again!!!
Oh yeh! ;p
@tawnypress Waiting for mine huh? Just wait...You're gonna love it! LOL
Nice! Who did you buy the Jessica Simpson boots for? I like those!
aren't those runs called junk miles????
Hate that.. was thinking the same thing about my house.
Not the same one...but that is wild!
Yes.. You will freeeze you butt off. But hopefully it is clear! I always wanted to bungee jump off the GG bridge...hmmmmm.
Soooo good. On the ipod and good running music!
science project, 8th grade. Process feed vrs organic. Not making a difference. Well, the processed ones are a bit more skiddish!
In...for sure!
I will come to that. I am sure @dawnmiller will gladly join too!
did you find what you wanted? I am dealing with chickens in my la casa...
get out much? He bailed 3 weeks ago!
Mustang. The bailed to Cal. Parents still live in Redmond. My older sister was a Kang!
I almost did break my nose in a bounce house. I think that is why I am fearful now! I was a gymnast. Should come back.
Where did you go to H school?? LW? Juanita? I miss it up there too.
Yes I did. I did a front flip, was OK. Went for the back flip and pulled out...was scared. How do you get the courage back?
YES.. It is not updating..did you get it!!
What tonight??? Trampoline fun? Wait... I can do that! I will work on perfecting the back flip...
Redmond, Wa....I run Kirkland water front every time I am up there!
What hotel is the question?
Ha...animal? More like psycho! Ironman 2010...then I will be an animal!
Wow... so excited! I get to go to Costco. Just what I want to do! 3 high leg kicks for costco!
I5 in. 8.53 pace. Thanks 2 the downhill.
First gu @ 8 m. All up this far! Eye of the tiger! Sweet!
Quarter way in. The pioneer is telling me 2 stop 4 a beer! Keep going I5 more 2 go!
had to charge the forerunner...the damn thing never stays charged long...
I am really leaving on my run now. From here to PV and back...send me the good run vibes.. I need them!
Putting down some coffee with a PBJ. Got my gear in check. 20 Miles here I come! Did I mention I have a cold? Maybe this will help!
hmmm.. I thought I would use http://tinyurl.com/yqxaau to map my run. I think I need to practice. Going to use the Forerunner!
Morning! Heading 2 buy coffee. Need it bad! Really bad.
crabby patty crabby patty...why am I the only fun one here??
Outa here...need sleep.
Lets see..if they did it once why wouldn't they do it again...2 long ass TD returns. Sorry Romo...not such a fun Bday!
Ok...that was not good. Ravens 25...77 yard TD. OUCH Cowboys what were you thinking???
home. relaxing. wrapping some gifts maybe...drinking a blue moon. Wait.. I need an orange! Good thing there are some on my tree!
is heading out to do some finish work. And them maybe I will make some cookies from scratch and sew something for the kids!
hitting the hot tub with my gingersnap latte. I'm hot and I'm cold....
Pina colada slurpee. Thanks 7 II.
home from costco. Whipping up some mac and cheese....yeh, whatever.
done for now. Must go to costco. @davepeck forget to pick up my case of wine.
day 2 with sick 13 yr old. HELP ME!!! I thought it was supposed to be a 24 hr flu?
